message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe would be highly valuable to you. I'm asking for $14,000. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Could you consider that?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I'm eager to make a deal, $12,000 is a bit too low for me. Could you consider $13,500? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations.
I understand your concerns, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $13,000?
